title: Drawing, "Medieval Tower and Ruins, Near Velletri, Italy", April 29, 1869
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at center: Italy;at bottom right in various locations;  2 / 2 bright yellow / flower bushes green / yel [low] / spring; and at left: yel green

Verso:  Inscribed with caption in  graphite:  Near Velletri / [ and dated April 29, 1869]
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a hill with a buildin with a tower on top shown in the left foreground, and a mountain in the right rear; a man is shown beneath and beside and lines in the center; at wooded hillside at bottom right; and high weeds at left.

Verso:  Vertical view at the top of a medieval tower rising over ruins, parts of which are covered by vines

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Medieval Tower and Ruins, Near Velletri, Italy", April 29, 1869.
April 29, 1869. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-86.
